Proper reason: bad crop 

infamous cropped the whole movie to 2.4:1 however there are several imax
sequences with an AR of 1.78:1, which means infamous cut off around 200 pixels
from those sequences. Check the screenshot in sample folder. This of course
means there are scenes with and without black borders. This is the way it&#039;s
supposed to be, not an error. And if you are wondering why you didn&#039;t notice
any AR changes on the DVD, it&#039;s only on the Bluray
